parameters.name: endpoint
parameters.description: The endpoint for the study or series

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: Identifiers for the Study, such as DICOM Study Instance UID and Accession number

parameters.name: instance
parameters.description: SOP Instance UID for an instance

parameters.name: performer
parameters.description: The person who performed the study

parameters.name: series
parameters.description: DICOM Series Instance UID for a series
